ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 21
Message-ID: <17248.21.73.959279670@...>
Date: Sat, 06 Mar 1999 17:49:28 -0500
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Password, etc.

>From: "cheb cheb" <bluecheese101@...>
>
>Who said I was asking for the password?? I know the password. I'm askin 
>for levels!! geeeeeeeeeezzzzzzzzzzz.........................

I'm not sure how, but the initial reply from Seth had a line quoted asking
for the password (the original message didn't show up for me) .. I'm not
sure if was in a message that I missed, or simply something that got
confused in the list.

In any case -- anyone who has lost their password, simple mail me (at
tricket@...), and yes, I'll be happy to get you a new one once I
verify your information.

In terms of levels -- anyone who's interested, just hang out on this list
for another week or so. One of the other list members volunteered to do
what I've been too lazy to do myself: take a number of levels that have
submitted, and make a coherent package available :) It's a time-consuming
task, so give him a bit more time, but I'm sure he's still working on it :>

Regarding the $800 Gladiator 5D game .. yes, that's not the real cost; the
real game is $899.95, with a $50 rebate for Gladiator 3 users ;->  (in
other words -- the person who wrote the first note was joking).

--Tom
